pr_title: GEODE-7949: Geode Redis - Get/Set commands for RedisString datatype to cover new parameters

timeline.message:
GEODE-7949: Geode Redis - Get/Set commands for RedisString datatype to cover new
parameters

timeline.bodyText: Setting a key here seems unnecessary since the setting with XX  on line 215 should clear TTL.
timeline.author: sabbey37
sabbey37

timeline.message:
Adds 
- integration tests for negative expiration values
- unit tests for getExecutor

timeline.bodyText:
the names of these tests are inconsistent:
here Does_not_Exist has underscores when the convention suggests no underscores and camelCase
the word HONOR used above seems inconsistent with the other language of the the test names.
timeline.author: prettyClouds

timeline.bodyText:
i think this test belongs in the HSET tests, not in the strings.
Consider moving it?
Another option might be moving all the tests that re-write keys into a single test, so that context is in one place.
timeline.author: prettyClouds

replies.bodyText: also, we might want to test that set overrides the hset, if we are not doing so already
replies.author: prettyClouds

timeline.bodyText:
I think the extra containsKey call is not needed in this method. Region.get will return null if a region does not contain the key and null will not be equal to REDIS_PROTECTED.
So I advise you get rid of the containsKey call.
timeline.author: dschneider-pivotal

timeline.message: Removing a redundant safety check and fixing formatting
